description.value:
Trigger A creature carrying a light source ends their turn in area F8

Effect The walls fire beams of chilling dark fog at the triggering creature, who takes @Damage[10d6[cold]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:25|basic:true] save). The beams also attempt to counteract any light source the triggering creature carries. Non-magical light sources of 7th level or less are automatically extinguished. Against other light sources, the lightlock casts a 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] spell with a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+14 #Counteract]]{+14} to attempt to counteract the light.

details.description: The strange fog layer on the walls swirls and churns, then suddenly fires several beams of dark mist into the room.
details.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:27] (master) to disrupt some of the hidden runes that focus the trap's energies, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] (4th level, counteract DC 25) or any spell with the Light trait to counteract the trap
details.reset: The lightlock takes 1 minute to restore its energy, after which it can be triggered again.
